SELECT t.id, t.title, t.date, t.path, t.parent_id, t.radio, date_format( t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS create_time, date_format( t.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS update_time FROM timeline t WHERE t.delete_time IS NULL
AND t.title LIKE concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')
ORDER BY create_time DESC
